name: Play it again Sam 8
overview: A compilation of 4 games: Around the World in 40 Screens a single player scrolling maze game using the Repton 3 engine and featuring African, American, Arctic, Ocean and Oriental scenarios. It included screen and character editors. It was written by Matthew Atkinson and was originally released in 1987 by Superior/Acornsoft. Mr. Wiz a single player maze game. It was written by John Llewellyn and was originally released in 1984 by Superior. Quest a single player arcade adventure. It was written by Tony Oakden and was originally released in 1988 by Superior/Acornsoft. Winter Olympiad 88 a sports simulation for 1 to 4 players featuring biathlon, bobsled, ski jump, slalom and speed skating. It was written by David Croft and was originally released in 1988 by Tynesoft with a budget reissue on the Micro Value label.
